sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import styles from "./custom.module.css" ; import axios from 'axios'; class Register extends Component { state = { username: '', password: '', Confirmpassword: '', email: '', phone: '', emailError:'' , passwordError:'', confirmpasswordError:'', phoneError:'' } validRegister(){ if(!this.state.email.includes("@")){ this.setState({emailError:"Invalid email address"}) return false; } if(this.state.password.length <= 5){ this.setState({passwordError:"Password should be atleast 6 characters!"}) return false; } if(this.state.password!==this.state.Confirmpassword){ this.setState({confirmpasswordError:"Password and Confirm password doest not match"}) return false; } if(this.state.phone.length!=10){ this.setState({phoneError:"Phone number should be 10 digits"}) } return true; } handleSubmit(){ console.log("going"); if(this.validRegister()){ console.log("validated"); let formData = new FormData(); formData.append("username",this.state.username); formData.append("password",this.state.password); formData.append("Confirmpassword",this.state.Confirmpassword); formData.append("email",this.state.email); formData.append("phone",this.state.phone); const url="http://localhost:8080/register"; axios.post(url,formData) .then(res=> window.location= "/contacts" ) .catch(err=> window.location= "/register"); } } render() { return (

CONTACTS

User Name: this.setState({ username: e.target.value })} />


Password: this.setState({ password: e.target.value })}/>

{this.state.passwordError}



Confirm Password: this.setState({ Confirmpassword: e.target.value })}/>

{this.state.confirmpasswordError}



EMAIL: this.setState({ email: e.target.value })}/>

{this.state.emailError}



PHONE: this.setState({ phone: e.target.value })}/>

{this.state.phoneError}



{this.handleSubmit()}} className="btn btn-primary" value="CREATE"/>

); } } export default Register;
